definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: Real-life details fill these books of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 真实的生活细节在这些死亡之书中随处可见。

sentences.english: However, high-producing lines that express these genes are not generally available.
sentences.chinese: 但是，表达这些基因的高产品系并非随处可得。

sentences.english: Tarpaulin, can be seen everywhere in China and is said not only very unique landscape.
sentences.chinese: 篷布，在中国不仅随处可见而且是道很独特的风景。

sentences.english: The use of hypotaxis and parataxis can be found almost everywhere in literature.
sentences.chinese: 有关形合与意合的实例在文学作品中也几乎随处可见。

sentences.english: Now in the campus, there many intimate lovers walking around.
sentences.chinese: 现在在校园里，亲昵的情侣随处可见。

sentences.english: New ideas can come from anywhere.
This flower is not seeing eVery abundancewITe.
sentences.chinese: 这花并否则随处可见的。

sentences.english: It is quite common to see people walking and talking on the cell phone in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国随处可见边走边用手机打电话的人。

sentences.english: Manicure counters are a familiar sight in Singapore's ubiquitous shopping malls, which also boast at least one beauty salon each.
sentences.chinese: 美甲店和美容院在新加坡的各大商场中随处可以看见。

sentences.english: Currently U. S. soybeans and meals have complete access into the Malaysian market.
sentences.chinese: 目前美国大豆及豆粕在马亚西亚市场上随处可见。

sentences.english: And this, of course, is common enough in everyday life.
sentences.chinese: 习惯化在我们的日常生活中随处可见。

sentences.english: However, on the edges of the salt flat, you will find the 12)llamas are everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 不过，在盐沼的边缘，你会发现美洲驼随处可见。

sentences.english: The kite-flying season has come and you can see kites flying everywhere, in parks.
sentences.chinese: 放风筝的季节到了，公园里，草地上，风筝随处可见。

sentences.english: These wolves cover a lot of frozen ground.
sentences.chinese: 在这冰天雪地随处可见这些狼群。
